fullName: booking get endpoint: Getting a specific booking

steps.name: Given  the base URL - https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com - is set
And  use any existing - true - booking Id as parameter.
When  a specific booking with random id's is requested
Then  the response status code should be 200
And  the booking details should be returned details - true
